org.interledger.psk

インタフェース PskContext

  • 既知の実装クラスのリスト:
    PskContext.ReceiverPskContext, PskContext.SenderPskContext

    public interface PskContext

    • メソッドの詳細

      • seed

        static PskContext seed(byte[] receiverSecret)
        Create a new receiver context with a new random token.

        By default the context will not use encryption

        パラメータ:
        receiverSecret - The receiver's local secret
        戻り値:
        A new PSK Context initialized with a random token

      • fromReceiverAddress

        static PskContext fromReceiverAddress(byte[] receiverSecret,
                                      InterledgerAddress address)
        Create a new receiver context based on the given Interledger Payment address.

        This will attempt to parse the token of the payment address.

        パラメータ:
        receiverSecret - The receiver's local secret
        address - The destination address of the incoming payment
        戻り値:
        A new PSK Context initialized with a token parsed of the provided address

      • fromToken

        static PskContext fromToken(byte[] receiverSecret,
                            byte[] token)
        Create a new receiver context based on the given token.
        パラメータ:
        receiverSecret - The receiver's local secret
        token - The token to use to initialize the context (must be 16 bytes)
        戻り値:
        A new PSK Context initialized with the given token

      • fromPreSharedKey

        static PskContext fromPreSharedKey(byte[] preSharedKey)
        Create a new sender context using the provided pre-shared key.
        パラメータ:
        preSharedKey - The key shared with the sender
        戻り値:
        a new context

      • generateEncryptionKey

        static SecretKey generateEncryptionKey(byte[] sharedKey)
        Deterministically derive an encryption key of a shared key.
        パラメータ:
        sharedKey - The shared key
        戻り値:
        a new AES encryption key derived of the shared key

      • generateFulfillmentHmacKey

        static byte[] generateFulfillmentHmacKey(byte[] sharedKey)
        Deterministically derive a fulfillment HMAC key of a shared key.
        パラメータ:
        sharedKey - The shared key
        戻り値:
        a byte array to use as the key when getting an HMAC of a payment packet as a preimage

      • hmacSha256

        static byte[] hmacSha256(byte[] key,
                         byte[] message)
        Perform a SHA 256 HMAC.
        パラメータ:
        key - The HMAC key to use (must be 32 bytes);
        message - The data to hash
        戻り値:
        the SHA 256 HMAC of the provided data

      • generatePreSharedKey

        static byte[] generatePreSharedKey(byte[] receiverSecret,
                                   byte[] token)
        Deterministically generate a shared key of a given receiver secret and a token.
        パラメータ:
        receiverSecret - The local receiver secret
        token - A random token
        戻り値:
        The key that can be shared with the sender in the PSK protocol

      • generateToken

        static byte[] generateToken()
        Generate a strong random 16 byte token using the system provided SecureRandom.
        戻り値:
        a random 16 byte token

      • generateReceiverId

        static byte[] generateReceiverId(byte[] receiverSecret)
        Deterministically generate a receiver id of a given secret.
        パラメータ:
        receiverSecret - The local receiver secret
        戻り値:
        the 8 byte receiver id

      • decryptMessage

        PskMessage decryptMessage(PskMessage message)
        Decrypt a PSK Message.

        Decrypts the data and private headers using AES 256 GCM and the key of this context.

        パラメータ:
        message - An encrypted PSK message
        戻り値:
        the decrypted PSK message (with private headers added)

      • encryptMessage

        PskMessage encryptMessage(PskMessage message)
        Encrypts a PSK Message.

        Encrypts the data and private headers using AES 256 GCM and the key of this context.

        パラメータ:
        message - An unencrypted PSK Message
        戻り値:
        A new message with AES-GCM encryption header and private headers and data encrypted.

      • generateFulfillment

        Fulfillment generateFulfillment(InterledgerPayment payment)
        Generate a fulfillment of a given Interledger Payment.

        This will encode the payment to a byte array and then HMAC the data using a key derived of the pre-shared key.

        パラメータ:
        payment - The payment for which a fulfillment is required.
        戻り値:
        The fulfillment for the given payment and this context.

      • generateReceiverAddress

        InterledgerAddress generateReceiverAddress(InterledgerAddress address)
        Generate a new address based on the given address by appending a new segment with the receiver ID and token of this context.
        パラメータ:
        address - Destination address without PSK suffix
        戻り値:
        new address with PSK suffix added

      • getToken

        byte[] getToken()
        Get the token for this context.
        戻り値:
        the token.
        例外:
        RuntimeException - if the current context is for a sender.

      • getReceiverId

        byte[] getReceiverId()
        Get the receiver id for this context.
        戻り値:
        the context.
        例外:
        RuntimeException - if the current context is for a sender.

      • getSharedKey

        byte[] getSharedKey()
        Get the shared key for this context.
        戻り値:
        the shared key.

      • getEncryptionKey

        SecretKey getEncryptionKey()
        Get the encryption key for this context.
        戻り値:
        the the AES key derived of the shared key.

      • getFulfillmentHmacKey

        byte[] getFulfillmentHmacKey()
        Get the HMAC key for generating fulfillments for this context.
        戻り値:
        the fulfillment HMAC key derived of the shared key.
